org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.upgrade
Class AeAbstractSQLUpgrader

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.AeSQLObject
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.AeAbstractSQLStorage
          org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.upgrade.AeAbstractSQLUpgrader
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeStorageUpgrader
public abstract class AeAbstractSQLUpgrader
extends AeAbstractSQLStorage
implements IAeStorageUpgrader

This class represents an abstract SQL storage upgrader class. It provides common functionality for all SQL storage upgraders.

Method Detail

wrapSQLConfig

public AeSQLConfig wrapSQLConfig(AeSQLConfig aSQLConfig)
Wraps the SQL config object in a new SQL config that will supply its own keys as well as proxying the keys provided. Default implementation does not wrap the SQL config, but simple returns the one passed in.

Parameters:
aSQLConfig -

upgrade

public void upgrade()
             throws AeStorageException
Description copied from interface: IAeStorageUpgrader
Upgrades a storage to the newest version. What this means will be very specific to the implementing class.

Specified by:
upgrade in interface IAeStorageUpgrader
Throws:
AeStorageException
See Also:
IAeStorageUpgrader.upgrade()

doUpgrade

protected abstract void doUpgrade(java.sql.Connection aConnection)
                           throws AeException
Internal method to do the actual upgrade work. This method is given a Connection object that it should use to do the upgrade.
